channel.title: CVE Feed for HGiga -- MailSherlock MSR45/SSR45

item.title: CVE-2021-22848|2024-08-03T18:51:07.527Z -- hgiga -- mailsherlock%20msr45%2Fssr45
item.description: HGiga MailSherlock contains a SQL Injection. Remote attackers can inject SQL syntax and execute SQL commands in a URL parameter of email pages without privilege.
